Stationary Frame: 𝑣 = 0
𝑡 = 0years
𝑥 = 0lyrs
Moving Frame: 𝑣 = 0𝑐
𝑡′ = 0years
𝑥′ = 0lyrs

Transformation
𝑡′ = 𝛾(𝑡−𝑣𝑥/𝑐²) = 0 (0−0·0)years
𝑥′ = 𝛾(𝑥−𝑣𝑡) = 0 (0−0·0)lyrs

Spacetime Interval (Stationary): 𝑣 = 0
𝑠² = 𝑐² 𝑡²−𝑥²
= (−)lyrs²
= lyrs²
Spacetime Interval (Moving): 𝑣 = 0𝑐
𝑠² = 𝑐²(𝑡′)²−(𝑥′)²
= (−)lyrs²
= lyrs²
